bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted and shaped with PowerDiamond down tube, integrated head tube, Double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: High Modulus C-7 carbon seat stays and A-6 Quaternary phase alloy with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, Cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger

components.description: TruVativ Rouleur Double w/GXP integrated spindle, 6061 forged alloy with 7075 CNC 39/53T Chainrings
TruVativ GXP exterior sealed cartridge bearings
Shimano Ultegra Shifter/Brake, Flight Deck compatible
V.P. 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow alloy spacer
Ritchey Logic Comp 31.8mm Road, 7075 Triple Butted Alloy
FC-440 Fuji Carbon Monocoque Integrated 1 1/8" Carbon steerer , 420g
Shimano Ultegra shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
